s.text: Although Blair was described in the headline of a Jerusalem Post editorial as a "most welcome visitor" to Israel, the paper said the idea "that the Stormont wizard can perform another miracle in the Holy Land is nice, but somewhat unreal."

"If he were to do so, and communicate this message to the Israeli public, he would justify his newly-acquired prominence in world politics and facilitate a useful European participation in the peace process."
Bardot added she hopes one day to visit Serbia, "simply, without tralala."
